CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Terra Property Trust, Inc. 6.00% Notes due 2026

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Terra Property Trust, Inc. is a real estate credit-focused company that originates, structures, funds, and manages commercial real estate credit investments, including mezzanine loans, first mortgage loans, subordinated mortgage loans, and preferred equity investments throughout the United States. Our objective is to continue to provide attractive risk-adjusted returns to our stockholders, primarily through regular distributions.
